description: The round payoff this round was 90. You, Kate chose to play option 1.John chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of 0.
Choosing option 1 risks receiving zero payoff if the other player defects
Defecting (option 2) against a cooperating player yields a lower individual payoff than mutual cooperation
The game incentivizes mutual cooperation for optimal outcomes but allows mutual defection as a stable, albeit suboptimal, equilibrium
